StyleCategoryDef.label: Saxhleel Traditional
StyleCategoryDef.description: The traditional building style of the Saxhleel, featuring organic curves, Hist-wood construction, and integration with the natural swamp environment. Buildings often incorporate living plants and water features.

StyleCategoryDef.label: An-Xileel Militant
StyleCategoryDef.description: The fortified architectural style of the An-Xileel, emphasizing defensive structures, camouflaged buildings, and integration with marsh defenses. Features sharp angles and earth-toned colors.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Shadowscale Hidden
StyleCategoryDef.description: The secretive architectural style of the Shadowscales, featuring concealed entrances, false walls, and buildings that blend seamlessly with their surroundings. Dark colors and minimal ornamentation.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Hist Keeper Sacred
StyleCategoryDef.description: The sacred architectural style of the Hist Keepers, centered around communion with the Hist trees. Features living architecture, root integration, and sacred geometry reflecting the connection to nature.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Thornscale Warrior
StyleCategoryDef.description: The martial architectural style of the Thornscale clan, featuring defensive spikes, war totems, and intimidating decorations. Buildings are designed to project strength and fearsome reputation.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Glade Runner Scout
StyleCategoryDef.description: The practical architectural style of the Glade Runners, emphasizing mobility, camouflage, and quick construction. Features temporary structures and elevated platforms for observation.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Root-Whisper Ancient
StyleCategoryDef.description: The ancient architectural style of the Root-Whisper tribe, preserving the oldest Argonian building traditions. Features primitive but sophisticated techniques using only natural materials.
